name: Event Registration (RSVP)
description: Simple event registration form for meetups, workshops, and parties with guest count and dietary preferences

content.formDescription: Please register below for our upcoming event. Your information helps us plan better.

formFields.name: dietary_preferences
formFields.label: Dietary Preferences/Restrictions
formFields.placeholder: e.g., Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-free, Nut allergy

formFields.name: special_requirements
formFields.label: Special Requirements or Accommodations
formFields.placeholder: Let us know if you need any special arrangements

formFields.name: additional_comments
formFields.label: Additional Comments
formFields.placeholder: Any questions or comments for the organizers?
